name: Hungary
declaringWar: I can't tolerate you anymore, hopefully you are at least a worthy opponent!
attacked: That can not be true. If it is, we will do our best to fend you off!
defeated: The bitter taste of defeat. You will taste it as well. Someday...
introduction: You stand in front of Matthias Corvinus, the great king of Hungary. Are you a friend or a foe?
hateYes: I never reject a good offer.
afterPeace: Let's celebrate this glorious day, when our nations decided to sign a peace treaty!
tradeRequest: I've got an offer. Are you interested?
uniqueText: +20% Production towards Science and Culture buildings. +50% Production bonus when constructing Walls and Castles.

name: Champa
declaringWar: We tolerated you way longer than we should, and now we demand you pay with your blood.
attacked: We will ensure, you will remember the day you turned on us.
defeated: So that's how it ends. That's not how I've imagined my last moments.
introduction: I am the Red King of Champa, Chế Bồng Nga! Are you here to trade?
hateNo: You dare to joke in my presence!?
hateYes: I must accept, even if i don't like you.
afterPeace: I hope this won't happen again and even if it does - We've learned a lesson!
tradeRequest: Will this work or do I need to propose you a better deal?
uniqueText: Units pay only 1 movement point to embark and disembark. Luxury resources provide 1 additional happiness. Trading posts provide 2 Culture and each Trade Route generates additional 1 Gold.
uniques: Units pay only 1 movement point to embark and disembark

name: Vietnam
declaringWar: We have tolerated you way longer than we should!
attacked: That was your biggest mistake so far. My armies are well equipped and thoroughly trained!
defeated: That's not an end. It's merely a beginning of your problems!
introduction: You stand in the presence of Great Emperor Lê Thánh Tông of Vietnam. Behave accordingly and you should be fine.
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
afterPeace: I am glad this war is finally over.

name: Khmer
declaringWar: I will show you the entire might of the Khmer people!
attacked: I think you will quite soon regret this decission.
defeated: You are too late! I have completed my destiny and nothing can take eternal glory from me, even death!
introduction: You look upon the King of Angkor, Emperor of Khmer, rightful Ruler of the World and Master of the Universe!
hateHello: Don't waste much of my time!
hateNo: No one would agree to that. Ever.
hateYes: You can't simply refuse such offer.
afterPeace: I think we should forget about this misunderstanding.
uniques: Receive Free Great Person when you discover Civil Service

name: Lithuania
declaringWar: You have brought the wrath of Dievas upon yourself!
attacked: We shall now show you the true power of Lithuania!
defeated: Dievas, Perkunas, why do you bring the wraith of Giltine upon me?
introduction: I am Gediminas, the Grand Duke of Lithuania, by the good will of Dievas, stay out of my way and none blood shall be spilled.
hateYes: Remember, never reject a good offer.
afterPeace: Let's celebrate this glorious day, when our nations decided to sign a peace treaty!
tradeRequest: Here is an offer that might benefit both of us.

name: Ireland
attacked: How dare You, you will beg for mercy!
defeated: I have failed, but the history of Ireland will never be lost
introduction: I am Tairrdelbach Ua Conchobair, the High King of Ireland. Who are You?
afterPeace: The bards will sing songs about this war. I am glad it is over.
tradeRequest: Here is an offer that might benefit both of us.
uniqueText: Policies cost does not increase with the number of cities at a cost of double unhappiness from number of cities.
uniques: Each city founded increases culture cost of policies [100]% less than normal
Unhappiness from number of Cities doubled

name: Tibet
declaringWar: It is your time to pass the trial of avalanche!
attacked: How dare you disturb the peace?
introduction: Welcome to the roof of the world, friend. You must be tired, please take a rest, we will talk later.
hateYes: I never reject a good offer.
afterPeace: Let's celebrate this glorious day, when our nations decided to sign a peace treaty!
uniqueText: +25% towards Great People in all cities settled next to Mountains. +2 Culture from every Great Improvement

name: Bulgaria
declaringWar: Ready your Horses my warrior! This day, blood will be spilled!
attacked: What? I thought you are smarter!
introduction: And who are you stranger, what brings you to Bulgarian Empire?
hateLetsHearIt: Ist taht all you have to offer?
tradeRequest: I've got an offer. Are you interested?

name: Sicily
declaringWar: I can't tolerate you anymore, hopefully you are at least a worthy opponent!
attacked: That can not be true. If it is, we will do our best to fend you off!
defeated: The bitter taste of defeat. you will taste it as well. Someday...
introduction: You stand in front of Matthias Corvinus, the great king of Hungary. Are you a friend or a foe?
hateYes: I never reject a good offer.
afterPeace: Let's celebrate this glorious day, when our nations decided to sign a peace treaty!
tradeRequest: I've got an offer. Are you interested?
uniques: Pay only one third the usual cost for naval unit maintenance

name: Republic of Genoa
declaringWar: I think we might have conflicting interests!
attacked: I hope you studied that thoroughly, because there will be no mercy.
introduction: You stand in front of Simone Boccanera, the doge of Republic of Genoa. Would you mind a cup of wine?
afterPeace: Hopefully that little war did not impact our economic relations much.
uniqueText: Adopting a new Policy branch may trigger Social Change event in your Capital, which will provide Free Technology once completed.

name: Papal States
declaringWar: It is the time you should to learn the God's will
attacked: I excommunicate you, burn in hell!
introduction: Welcome, I am Innocent III, the disciple of Christ and apostolic succesor to Saint Peter.
afterPeace: What do you want, you vile beast?
uniqueText: Non-air units may move immediately once bought. After researching Theology choose a council bonus and gain an ability to recruit Papal Guards and its upgrades.
